Hey thanks so much. Game installed fine. You must paste the Acclaim Entertainment file into your Program files. Then create a new folder (mine's on my desktop) and copy and paster eax.dll, and AppSettings.dll in it along with the CD Crack and it worked fine :D
If anyone is having trouble installing or cracking let me know just send a msg then ill write howto. Cheers
